Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory301.png'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '0.5', 5: '0'}
{3: 'After a grueling escape, the survivors finally reach the temporary shelter.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Reports are coming in that even the elite squad is overwhelmed. No reinforcements are arriving. We're trapped here for now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "The Corrupted are swarming out like a disturbed hornet's nest. I've never seen a swarm this size outside the Dead Zone. This is a disaster.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thompson', 3: 'So they really did come from the Dead Zone. Babylonia warned us about this.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Thompson', 3: "On the bright side, we've managed to get this many people this far.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Let's assess what equipment we have left. If the elite squad can't break through the Corrupted horde by dawn, we're in for a serious battle.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: 'Worst-case scenario, we can all grab some EMP bombs and make a charge into the Corrupted. That should create a path for us to escape.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'No one voices an objection to this insane plan. Shorthalt taps his communicator again.'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: 'Remember to keep your comms open when the time comes.', 4: '1'}
{3: "The Constructs present respond in unison. It's only been a day, yet some of their comrades will never hear these words of comfort again."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "How's Wanshi holding up? We have plenty of staff—shouldn't a doctor with a head wound be resting?", 4: '1'}
{3: "Shorthalt raises his arm, inspecting the crudely patched crack in his casing. Glancing around at the other Constructs, he sees that Wanshi has already tended to everyone's injuries."}
{3: 'Wanshi is still back there with the refugees, not even thinking about taking a break.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Thompson', 3: "He'll be okay. Kamui's with him.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thompson', 3: 'In a situation like this, I guess only Kamui can stay so calm, haha.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thompson', 3: 'You and I are freaking out, but he seems completely at ease, even in the middle of this chaos.', 4: '1'}

{3: 'Thompson taps his wrist, and the damaged projector sputters to life, displaying a blurry image of a boy. The projection fades quickly, but not before a couple of sparks dramatically erupt from the device.'}
{3: "Shorthalt's optical sensors shift their focus away from Thompson's projection."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Thompson', 3: 'Shorthalt, what did you do before you became a Construct?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: 'The police.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: 'I was one of the first to undergo modifications, and I wasn\'t exactly a spring chicken when it happened... Surely you\'ve heard of the term "police" before?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thompson', 3: "No, no, actually... Euan guessed you were a police officer before. I can't believe he was right.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "What for? Do I look like someone you'd trust?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thompson', 3: 'Of course not. You\'re the mastermind behind the "EMP bomb suicide run" against the Corrupted.', 4: '2'}
{3: "A flicker of doubt crosses Thompson's face, and his forced smile begins to falter."}
{2: 'Thompson', 3: "Looks like Euan's learned a thing or two from you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Don't be like me. Sure, I don't exactly look like a saint—and I'm definitely not one—but sometimes, I wonder if I was born to be a protector.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Thompson's gaze falls on the new nameplates pinned to Shorthalt's chest—grim reminders of the Constructs lost in the battle. One of them bears Euan's name."}
{3: "Shorthalt quickly covers the nameplates, not wanting to prolong Thompson's grief."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Contact the other squads. We need to secure the perimeter. We can't let those Corrupted overrun us again.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Shorthalt rises from the ruins, watching Wanshi tend to a child while Kamui stands guard nearby, helping distribute supplies.'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "This damn Punishing... I'm sick of seeing people die.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory302.png'}
{3: "This is the darkest night of Wanshi's life."}
{3: 'The sky above is devoid of stars, replaced by a sickly glow from the artificial lights that illuminate the makeshift stronghold.'}
{3: 'Far from the Central Purification Filter, low on supplies, and with aid slow to arrive, the refugees teeter on the brink of despair, ravaged by disease and infection.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'How much immune serum do we have now?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Volunteer Doctor', 3: "We're completely out, and Dr. Natalie is out of stock too. What are we going to do?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Volunteer Doctor', 3: "It's not just the refugees—there are volunteers with critical injuries too. Can we really just stand by and watch them die?", 4: '2'}
{3: "The young doctor's voice trembles as he speaks to Wanshi."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Even the Wish-Granting Machine can't conjure serum out of thin air—you'll need to collect wish cards first.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Volunteer Doctor', 3: 'Why?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "That kid's already got three stamps. Let's get him some candy as promised.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Here you go, Wanshi. Scissors. Better sterilize those before you use them.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Kamui throws the scissors to Wanshi and then drops a heavy arm around a volunteer doctor's shoulders, nearly knocking him over."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'If we found candy in the supplies unexpectedly, who knows? Maybe we overlooked some serum too! Let me help you look, come on, come on...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Volunteer Doctor', 3: 'You...', 4: '2'}

{3: "Kamui escorts the anxious doctor away, and Wanshi finally lets out a breath he didn't realize he was holding. He sits back down on the ground, laying out his sutures and scissors on a relatively clean piece of metal."}
{2: 'Girl', 3: 'Doctor... am I infected too?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "No, no, we were in a rush earlier. You've just caught a mild cold.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Boy', 3: "Doctor, how's my arm? It hurt like crazy before, but now I can't feel anything.", 4: '3'}
{3: 'The bandage is soaked through, the flesh beneath it ravaged by the Punishing virus. Wanshi tries to stitch it up, but the damage is too severe.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "You won't feel any more pain. I gave you some painkillers.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Girl', 3: 'Painkillers... Nathan said they were the best.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Girl', 3: 'Is he okay?', 4: '1'}
{3: "The children look towards the corner, where a volunteer doctor's white coat is beneath Nathan's body, his white coat soaked in blood."}
{3: "Nathan's asleep. He won't wake up."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Nathan's asleep. He'll wake up tomorrow.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Girl', 3: 'Nathan... he saved me and now...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boy', 3: "This is all my fault... We panicked when we saw the Corrupted. Only Nathan kept us moving forward. If I'd been stronger, I could have led them to safety... Cough!", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Boy', 3: 'Doctor... I hurt everywhere too...', 4: '3'}
{3: "The doctor's hands tremble as he gazes at the small bodies before him, each one bearing the scars of both illness and guilt."}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'You all... did a fantastic job today.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "No one's to blame.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'He manages a weak smile.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Do you still want to go to Babylonia now?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "I have a few boxes of medicine here. They're very valuable and only for emergencies. You need to keep an eye on them for me.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "When dawn comes, people from Babylonia will arrive to rescue us. They'll take all the good kids back to Babylonia.", 4: '2'}
{3: "He rattles several medicine boxes, drawing everyone's attention."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: "I want to see who can keep their medicine safe all night. You've got this.", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Once you get to Babylonia, you'll grow up in the youth center. If you do well, you might even get adopted, have a family who cherishes you, learn the world's most advanced knowledge, and make more friends...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'His voice lowers and cracks with emotion.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Until you're all grown up and strong...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'You can become anything you dream of—engineers, doctors, artists. You can make a real difference in the world.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "We'll stand united against the Punishing, and together, we'll reclaim our home...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Do you want that kind of future?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "You'll love it, right?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The doctor holds up the medicine boxes, his eyes pleading with the children for a glimmer of hope.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Raise your hand if this is the kind of life you always dreamed of.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The children raise their hands in unison, their eyes fixed on him with hopeful anticipation.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Protect these medical supplies with your lives. Watch each other's backs—they're not to be opened under any circumstances. Understand?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The children clutch the empty boxes filled with wishes to their chests. Those boxes are their tickets to a better life, giving them the strength to endure this terrible night a little longer.'}
{3: 'The surrounding adults stare at the doctor with hollow eyes, easily seeing through his deception. Just moments ago, he slipped wish cards into the empty medicine boxes.'}
{3: 'The medicine box rattles when shaken, mimicking the sound of life-saving pills rattling inside.'}
{3: "No one challenges him. They all know what he's trying to do."}
{3: "He's just a doctor, begging his patients to survive."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory301.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Thompson', 3: "Over an hour has passed, and there's still no sign of the rescue team. Are we really going to resort to a bomb?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Gather the kids first. Wanshi and Kamui, you're responsible for their evacuation. The rest of us... we hold the line until dawn.", 4: '1'}
{3: "The emergency comms explode with activity, piercing alarms blaring from every Construct's terminal."}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Looks like they're not coming.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: 'Corrupted ahead! Large group! Prepare for combat!'}
{3: 'Shorthalt quickly turns on his comms to relay emergency instructions to the refugees behind.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shorthalt', 3: 'Kamui! Wanshi! Do you copy?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "We're going in! Get those refugees to safety. If they run into any Corrupted, they're as good as dead!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Thompson?! Damn, those things are moving faster than we anticipated! Look out, they're right behind you!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Corrupted overpower Thompson and other Constructs, pinning them to the ground before unleashing a terrifying shriek and charging towards the crowd.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory302.png'}
{3: 'Kamui leaps forward and positions himself at the front of the group, holding his greatsword across his body. His optical module locks onto the nearest Corrupted, ready for the attack.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'No time... I need to get a weapon as well.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "You're pretty quick, aren't you? Huh? More coming from behind?", 4: '1'}
{3: "The Corrupted close in from all sides. Despite Kamui's lightning-fast swings with his Greatsword, some still manage to break through his defenses."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Wanshi! One's headed your way!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Wanshi returns, his gun blazing. A long-range shot shatters the Corrupted\'s "legs", sending it crashing to the ground.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Wanshi fires another shot.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Was that... the Corrupted's speaker?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Nice shot, Wanshi!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Must have misheard it...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He stands firm behind Kamui and fends off the remaining Constructs, protecting the refugees.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'One... two... three... There are simply too many of them.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A pounding headache sets in, leaving him feeling drained and exhausted.'}
{3: "After knocking down a Construct with the refugees' help, he straightens up, clutching his head in pain. He spots a Construct arm amongst the fallen, and his expression darkens."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Construct casualties ahead...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "I'm the only Construct doctor here. I have to find them.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Refugee A', 3: 'What about us?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Kids, the elderly, and the wounded to the rear. Volunteers, keep tending to the injured. Everyone else capable of fighting, get to your feet and move to the front lines.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'A refugee collapses, burying his face in his hands.'}
{2: 'Refugee A', 3: "I'm sick of this! Why do we have to fight the Corrupted head-on? And what's the point of those metal things pretending to be human?!", 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Natalie', 3: 'Pretending to be human?! We Constructs were all modified from humans, and you dare call us "metal things"?! If I were one of those Constructs fighting the Punishing with their lives right now, I\'d rip your head off!', 4: '2'}
{3: "A splitting headache rages through Wanshi's skull."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Wanshi! Thompson's down! They're about to be overrun!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'His ears ring, but he checks his equipment and reloads his pistol, his hands trembling slightly.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Refugee B', 3: "Quiet... Everyone needs to understand the situation. If we keep losing Constructs at this rate, we won't last much longer.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boy', 3: 'Doctor... will you come back? Please... Cough!', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Girl', 3: "Be careful out there, Doctor. We'll behave.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Kamui pulls Wanshi close as a Corrupted—somehow slipped inside—lunges at them. Kamui fends off the attacker.'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'You okay there? You look a bit green.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "I'm fine... Just go ahead.", 4: '1'}
{3: "He insists he's fine, but a throbbing pain splits his head open, making him feel nauseous. Something feels wrong, as if something alien is trying to force its way into his mind."}
{3: 'But there are more urgent matters to attend to.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'We need to hold this line, or the Corrupted will overrun us!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'My maintenance kit will come in handy! Take me there, Kamui!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory301.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shorthalt', 3: 'Watch out, Felbert!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Felbert', 3: 'Argh!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Thompson', 3: "Hold back! He's infected!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Thompson, the Support Construct, examines Felbert and shakes his head in dismay.'}
{2: 'Thompson', 3: "My kit's useless now, and my leg's busted. Unless a miracle worker shows up, we're all as good as dead out here.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Thompson taps the broken projector on his wrist again, but the device remains unresponsive.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "I've been meaning to ask—is that your son?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Thompson', 3: "Yes, my son is still in Babylonia. He must be a young man now. Hasn't Wanshi mentioned him?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "He won't even talk about himself, let alone share your story.", 4: '2'}
{3: "Shorthalt slashes through several more frenzied Corrupted, throwing them back into the surging tide. He's holding onto a desperate gamble that might buy him some time."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "This attack is unlike anything we've seen before... I hope he and Kamui make it out alive. Ugh, more of them! They just keep coming!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: 'Get ready to set off...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'A bullet rips through the air, taking down a few Corrupted. The Greatsword follows, plunging into the ground, creating a temporary barrier.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Hey! I've brought Wanshi with me!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Under Kamui\'s protection, Wanshi leaps over the ruins with his "life-saving" equipment, rushing straight towards the perilous area.'}
{3: 'He\'s not sure what\'s driving him anymore—perhaps he just wants to atone for his past actions with these "butcher\'s hands".'}
{3: "He leaps down from the ruins, hot on Kamui's heels, clutching the Construct repair components to his chest."}
